reviews.review:
BioShock Infinite is the latest entry in the System-/BioShock series. Fittingly, it's a game about a guy entering some strange new environment and shooting his way through it. I like it a lot, for the reasons explained below.

It's set in Columbia, an ultra-Christian-American-conservative sky city, with vehement racial segregation and pre-WW1 attitudes and spectacular architectural and technological wonders contrasted with appalling poverty. It's a veritable paradise if you're a white male, or a white female with no self-respect. However, it's also set 48 years before BioShock, although the game seems to forget that a lot in terms of what technology was available, even for a utopia that can [spoiler] steal stuff from other dimensions [/spoiler]; the social attitudes seem a bit anachronistic too, although that's obviously harder to gauge. Still, the world-building's impeccable, and Columbia can be a marvel to just walk around and look at.

Anyway, you're Booker DeWitt, a protagonist who can actually speak and express character for once. You're sent to Columbia to get a girl by some mysterious people, from some other mysterious people. I'm not gonna try to explain the plot more, 'cause it gets kinda fuckin' complex, but I will say that I appreciate the gleeful abandon with which the protagonists hapazardly [spoiler] switch through dimensions to solve problems (even though this game has some really fucking weird ideas about how a multiverse would work). [/spoiler] Also, the story's really good overall, with an ending that simultaneously tied up the game's million dangling plot threads (well, most of them—I looked at the game's Wikipedia page after finishing it and there were a few things there that the game still hadn't told me) and really stuck with me. I recommend BioShock Infinite for the story, if nothing else.

The gameplay's pretty good, too, although certainly not innovative. Most of the gameplay elements are just reskins of BioShock stuff: Plasmids are now Vigors; Gene Tonics are now Gear and Infusions; Big Daddies are now various minibosses (and, in a more thematic sense, the [spoiler] Songbird [/spoiler]); bathyspheres are now rail travel, which looks ridiculously fucking fun; audio logs are now voxophones; Vita-Chambers are now just being revived by your friend on the spot; and hacking is now lockpicking and opening [spoiler] Tears [/spoiler], which is somehow even less involved than BioShock 2—you just press E on things and your NPC companion gets it. This works better in some cases than others. Rail travel is fuckin' sweet, while Vigors don't really seem to exist in the world for any specific reason besides "It's a BioShock game."

However it's not all reskins—some things have just been directly copied over, like how looting food and money works, and vending machines, and weapon upgrades, and the way enemies are weirdly durable, and the occasional orchestral stings when you do something in combat, and the fact that you travel through a bunch of areas owned by some famous local as you constantly get sidetracked trying to escape. Again, it works better in some cases than in others.

As I said, it's mostly like BioShock, but there are a few changes here and there. They got rid of that navigation arrow, unless you want it to just give you a hint. Manual save is gone, which is a bit of a bugger. The GUI has gotten better; it's moved from "Art Deco" to "basic functionality." It takes a good cue from BioShock 2 by letting you use Plasmids—shit, I mean Vigors—and guns at the same time (as well as making the gameplay just smoother and faster generally). There's a regenerating shield on top of your health bar, which basically means that not every fight will leave you short on health. You can only hold two weapons, which is weak, and the game tries to make up for it by just having lots of different kinds of automatic weapon. You can read transcripts of audio logs now, which is convenient. Upgrades cost money, which might sound like a downer, but it's actually kind of nice because at long last money has a use in a BioShock game. None of these changes are major, but they generally make the game feel faster and more streamlined, if a bit less deep.

Your NPC sidekick, Elizabeth, is an interesting, engaging, and believable character—if a bit anachronistically spirited and independent—but she looks and sounds more 24 than 19.

The game goes on a lot about how killing is bad and corrupts you, but then you also get to explode enemies' heads with headshots and electric shocks, set them on fire until they burn down to just a skeleton, decapitate them with your rail travel device, or lots of other goofy fun stuff. If you shot enemies once, and then they fell over and started bleeding all over the place and screaming for an uncomfortable amount of time, like in a Tarantino film, then they could really make the point that killing is bad. Making it cartoonish and fun, however, just sends a mixed message. Shut up about how I'm a monster, Elizabeth, I'm trying to have fun with this hand cannon.

Your jump is unrealistically high, which is refreshing.

The game's really goddamn pretty.

In short, BioShock Infinite is a lot like BioShock, but with a lot of the gameplay nuance stripped out in favor of a greater narrative focus. The former gets on my nerves a bit at times, but usually it works well and I do really like the narrative. I really like BioShock Infinite, and recommend it highly. Not quite as much as BioShock, maybe, but certainly more than BioShock 2.

Cara, que jogo é esse. Sem dúvidas o Infinite e o Bioshock 1 estão no meu top 5 dos games. A história é muito intrigante e porque não dizer bem complexa. Fiquei meio em estado de choque ao acabar o game e tive que pesquisar um pouco para entender todas as peças desse quebra-cabeça que é a história desse jogo. Mesmo sendo bem complexo ele se explica completamente no final e tudo que vc passou durante o game vai se encaixar de alguma forma. 

Não tenho muito mais o que dizer... realmente só jogando para saber como esse game é incrível. Vale cada centavo e vc não irá se arrepender, ainda mais se gostou dos outros games da trilogia. Uma recomendação: compre a Collection que acaba saindo bem mais barato nas épocas de promoção da steam e vem com o jogo completo incluindo as DLCs. 

Sem mais, trilogia incrível. Nota: 9,5/10

Highly over rated nothing except amazing looking city, maybe inspired by Spielberg's Avatar. Story is strange and at places frustrating you would feel that your efforts were in vain. It progresses slowly.
Jokes on people who created star wars, mechanical humanoid robots. 
Powers of main character would make you think why people liked the game and before you would stop analysing you would find yourself uninstalling the game. Don't ant to complete it but do want to know the plot.
Marketing was strong.
游戏史上最真实的ai伊丽莎白小姐姐，回味无穷的多平行世界线剧情，让我吹一下这部神作

Spoiler içermez.

An itibariyle oyun bitti ve mükemmeldi. Bazı yerlerde kendini tekrarladığı hissine kapılıp sıkılmıştım ama oluşacak olayları tahmin etmeye çalışıp ve her seferinde çok daha farklı bir sonuç ile karşılaştığımda tabii ki oyuna olan devam etme isteğim kuvvetlendi ve bir yerden sonra tekrar hissini takmamaya başladım. Kaldı ki oyunun finalini açıklamak gerekirse kısaca  LEGENDD --- wait for it --- DARYYY. 

Oyunda çok olmasada finali kesinlikle böyle beklemiyordum. Alın parasını sonuna kadar hakeden bir oyun.

Uz od samotneho vydania prvej serie Bioshock :) sa toho trocha dost zmenilo toto neni bohuzial uz Rapture ale toto uz je mesto Colubia :) z okamziku ked vyletite tak vam normalne odpadnu oci!!! to je proste nepopisatelny zazitok :) ta akcnost ta hudba ta hratelnost ta grafika proste Wau!!! nerobim si z toho srandu ta hra je fakt kurva mega a kto ma gule odporucam si ju zahrat :) 
+GRAFIKA
+HRATELNOST
+Postavy 
+Pribeh
+ paradny koniec :) 
tejto hre nic nechyba 
10/10 odporucam kazdemu zahrat povinne!!!! :)

My favorite part of this game was the ending and I dont mean that in a "god this game was crap" kind of way. This game was good no where near as good as the original I feal the story felt a bit forced and wasnt as unique as the original, with that said the ending when you get there is worth it. for that special little twist.

definitely worth the download and play through.

This game is just awsome... it blew my mind. It´s about the value of life, racism and a whole lot more. It´s hella fun to play. Many different weapons, different abbilities and a lady that brings you health pots of ammo when you need it the most. How cool is that? If you havnt played this game yet, you should definitely play it.

Great gameplay and one of the most satisfying FPS games on the market. The story was kind of hard to follow, paticularly the ending, however you are mostly too lost in the action to pay attention to it.

Я просто случайно наткнулась на эту игру в стиме, потом посмотрела видос к ней, она меня заинтересовала. Первый раз сыгранула в нее на xbox друга, игра очень интересная, захватывающая, я не играла еще в первые части, но скоро буду. Сюжет меня просто поглатил(в прямом смысле слова), Я потратила на нее около 20 часов, и не жалею об этом. Игруля топчик. Думаю, на компуктере будет проще  в нее играть ;D В первый раз не въехала в сюжет, но потом дошло, просто шикарно! Пакупайте эту игру не смотря на цену! Я купила игру в комплекте со всеми частями, взяла по скидке в последний момент. Была очень счатлива, когда купила товар :) 
Пиу-пиу
Excelente juego
十年后，二十年后，三十年后，我还是能想起曾经玩过一部叫做生化奇兵无限的游戏，我还是能记起那个少了一根小拇指的女孩子--伊丽莎白。

IRADO! MT IRADO! ÓTIMO JOGO!
Gameplay mt divertida, com diferentes e interessantes modos de abordar uma situaçao especifica, grande variaçao de armas (com diverças melhorias cada uma) e itens com efeitos diversos, sendo possivel montar um personagem perito em certa abordagem (EX: um personagem com vantagens ao subir em aero-trilhos, ou com alta regeneraçao de vigores, ou ate mesmo um especialista em armas);
Mt poderes, cada um mais irado que o outro. Vc ganha os poderes de forma gradual, entao a pouca variedade no começo pode encher o saco, mas logo a variedae vai deixar tudo mais foda!
O jogo eh linear (com algumas partes de exploraçao, e alguns tipos de "missoes secundarias"), e tem uma duraçao ok, considerando que terminei o jogo com mais ou menos 18h no modo dificil.
A HISTÓRIA É DO CARALHO! MT IRADO! altos plot-twist mt irados, e personagens mt bem construidos e complexos pra cacete! pra poder entender essa porra direito vc ou vai ter que jogar prestando mt atençao, ou vai ter que jogar o final e o começo de novo (ou uma explicaçao no youtube pq vc é um preguiçoso do caralho), mas o mind-blow vale a pena!
poderia ser um pouco mais longo, mas sinceramente foda-se, nao faz diferença.
Se vc gosta de uma boa narrativa cola nesse game q tu ta tranquilo!
(o sistema de upgrade é meio retardado, principalmente pq quando vc morre vc perde dinheiro, que é justamente oq vc precisa pra fazer novos upgrades, entao meio que quando pior vc se sai, quanto pior vc vai permanecer; principalmente no modo mais dificil do jogo, que vc desbloqueia depois de terminar pela primeira vez, que até poderia ser divertito e desafiador mas acaba que se torna só frustrante pra caralho)
~09.5/10.0

Un gioco che non ha euguali, sia in termini di trama che di gameplay. Assolutamente consigliato a chi vuole trovare del tempo da dedicare a seguire una trama complessa e combattimenti di puro divertimento. A Bioshock Infinite non si può dire di no
Довольно интересная, но запутанная история. После прохождения вы еще долго будете изучать термины, разъяснения о том, о сем, что да как устроено. Может немного заeбет, однако эффект вас порадует.
갓-겜

I'm playing the BioShock's out of order so this was my first. That means I'm not biased by previous ones ;) 
Awesome game. The gunplay is solid and the best ever AI sidekick in a video game. I mean, she FINDS ammo for you while you're in a gun fight!!!
只玩了开头就有一种强烈的预感，这部绝对是神作！待我英语学成归来，再来细细品味其中的奥妙！！！

9.8/10
Thanks for the mindfuck

바이오 쇼크 스토리에 감탄했는데..
인피니티 엔딩은 정말 1도 예상 못했네요..

10 out of 10! In my top 5 favorite games of all time. It has everything from Guns, Magic, Multiverse Theory and Quantum mechanics. I definitely recommend you getting this game, it's one hell of a head trip.
The adventure of dad and daugther cross too many portals

I went into this game after hearing many great things but admittedly was a little skeptical it would not live up to the hype. I was quite wrong. It could take the first hour or so to get used to the combat if you are new to the bioshock series (as I was) and the game does start off a bit slow, but it ramps up quick and showed me exactly why this game is so loved. It took me roughly 12 hours to complete with trying to really checkout what the game had to offer and I am very happy with how good the game turned out to be. If you are on the fence about this game, buy it. You won't regret it.
Excelente saga!! No hay nada malo que decir, muy buena la remasterización.
То чувство, когда ты пощадил Слейта, а в итоге оказалось, что ты сделал ему только хуже.
Elizabeth很可憐，被兩個平行宇宙的父親毀了一生
Problematic..but I can't help but love these kind of (SPOILER) stories.

BEST                          GAME                              I                            HAVE                                                 EVER                                                          PLAYED

Bioshock Infinite es un juego complicado de calificar por un lado si lo comparamos con sus antecesores se puede ver que su gameplay no alcanza el nivel de los anteriores, todas las muchas opciones que teníamos en las anteriores entregas ahora se ven muy reducidas pasamos de una gran cantidad de perks y armas a tan solo cuatro perks equipables y dos armas que podemos llevar durante nuestra misión, se retiran los minijuegos de pirateo y su diseño de nivel deja mucho que desear ya que es bastante pobre y simple, realmente no vale la pena explorar, y aunque lo valiera, tampoco hay ni mucho que explorar, ni es muy interesante hacerlo, al menos en las zonas en donde hay enemigos pero, a pesar de esto, el juego suma bastante en muchos sentidos 
  Todo este gameplay más “procesado” y simple te deja bastante claro que este era un juego el cual estaba enfocado para un nuevo público, uno menos culto y acostumbrado a shooters como CoD y no a los de la vieja escuela, los cuales estaban más trabajados (aunque hay muchos de esta generación que tambien lo estan).
 En general el juego está bastante bien la verticalidad de los mapas cambia mucho el gameplay y es bastante divertido, lo unico que quizas no es tan bueno de este juego es su historia la cual es horrible, la mires por donde la mires.
엄지척

BioShock Infinite è stato, in assoluto, uno dei titoli che più ho apprezzato e amato. Dal gameplay allo storytelling, nessun elemento è lasciato al caso: ogni minuscolo dettaglio ha goduto della più sapiente cura – e [i]in game[/i] si vede. La trama è spettacolare, il finale soddisfacente e la grafica mozzafiato; il gameplay non è mai noioso, bensì sempre vario, ricco di dettagli e di elementi inediti da livello a livello. I meccanismi di gioco sono molto buoni e di facile comprensione (c'è da tenere a mente un paio di tasti fondamentali, oltre ai soliti WSAD, niente di trascendentale). A tratti il gioco è innegabilmente geniale, (forse solo in pochi se ne renderanno veramente conto), al punto da far urlare al miracolo per la quantità di cura di dettaglio e di gestione del gameplay.
Questo titolo è un must-have: più di un semplice FPS, più di un gioco di avventura/esplorazione – un gioiello.

this game!!!!! O_O it so good its fun and great story <3 but the ending... holy shit! the ending was so good and the twist <3
9/10!!! (fix the option so it would be "smother")

Начну с того что это игра входит в мой личный топ 3 - "Лучший сюжет ever"!!!

Ну и наконец самое важное.... Спасибо ребятам из CGInfo за ЩЕДЕВРАЛЬНУЮ озвучку + отдельное спасибо самой Анне за то что согласилась озвучить саму себя !!! Итог: ∞ кол-во Букеров/∞ возможных вариаций Элизабет !!!
9/10 Amazing
Рекомендую как человек прошедший её 8 раз

После первой и второй части,не привычно носить всего 2 пушки да еще и без выбора патронов.
На максимальном уровне не совсем понятно как и чем разрывать паки мобов если практически нет патронов ,а маны всего 1 полоска на юз способностей.В целом сюжет зачетный ,механика упростилась не в лучшую сторону.

bellissimo e ancora attualissimo.
si gioca che è un piacere, storia veramente ben fatta e bella fino alla fine.
Rapporto qualità/prezzo incredibile, visti gli anni del gioco lo trovate spesso in offerta. Design fantastico, con belle texture e colori.
Lo consiglio a tutti, sono circa 11-12 ore di gioco.
打开游戏的一瞬间我就被蒸汽朋克的精致画面所吸引了，简直太对我的胃口了。一个充满了想象力的朋克世界等着你来发掘。(喜欢伊丽莎白）

[h1]Bioshock Infinite; oynadığım en muhteşem oyunların arasına rahatlıkla giriyor.[/h1] 

[list]
[*]İnanılmaz hikaye,
[*]Mükemmel oynayış,
[*]Güzel grafikler,
[*]Fevkalade karakterler.
[/list]

[b]Eğer bugüne kadar bu oyunu oynamamışsanız ve hayatınıza yön vermenizi sağlayacak bir oyun arıyorsanız, kesinlikle alıp oynamalısınız. İki kez oynamama rağmen her seferinde içimde aynı hisleri yaşattı. Yeri geldi sevindim, yeri geldi irkildim, yeri geldi tüylerim diken diken oldu ve tabiki yeri geldi gözlerim doldu. Oyunun sonunu daha başından az çok tahmin etmeme rağmen harika bir deneyim yaşadığımı söyleyebilirim. Kesinlikle ölmeden önce oynamanız gerekiyor..[/b]

Ha bir de tetiklenmeyin ama şunu söyleyeyim;

[spoiler]Inception ve Zindan Adası, bu oyunun sonunun yanında portakalda vitamin gibi kalır.[/spoiler]

es un juegaso, no pense que este juego fuera hacer tan diferente de las anteriores dos entregas, tiene giros inesperados en lo que va de la historia, realmente no me esperaba la mayoria de cosas que venian, para tener ya su tiempo de haber salido el juego esta muy bien hecho y tiene buena trama, realmente recomendable

겨울 세일할때 구매했는데 스토리도 재미있지만 연출이 정말 좋네요. 최적화도 괜찮습니다

因为稍微有些晕fps，在打完本篇后拖了好久才通了海葬。然而头再晕也阻挡不了我对伊丽莎白的热爱！总的来说，《无限》在音乐和场景刻画方面足以给人留下深刻的映像，气氛也拿捏的十分到位。从进入天空之城哥伦比亚后，我的观感被一次又一次的冲击，而伊丽莎白则是那比哥伦比亚还要绚烂的、最惊艳的一抹色彩。很少有游戏能将角色刻画能那么完美，伊丽莎白她天真、活泼、聪明、感情细腻又坚强独立，她饱满而不扁平，仿佛要生生从游戏中走出来。从这个角度来讲，2k做的很好，至于其他方面，我也没必要多说什么，毕竟这是款早已登上神坛的游戏。就冲着伊丽莎白，这游戏也值得你买。
我永远不会忘记看到空中城市的第一眼。
Merita di essere giocato!

해봐야 안다 스토리가 왜 잘 짜졌다고 하는지 반전이란 이름의 극상이 어떤건지 
사람의 상상력,존재의식,개개인의 주관에 의한 생각이 어떤식으로도 담길수있다는 것을 한번쯤 확인하게된다
剧情很棒！很值得一玩
Love it, love the series.
完美的艺术品
Fantastic game! Loved the story, loved the ending, loved how everything all tied together and the gameplay is excellent! If you like single player FPS games this is a must.
Classic favorite of mine. Pick it up; it's usually cheap, and you'll be in for a treat. The graphics still hold up despite being 4ish years old. Looks especially nice with ultra and 4k.

Hardly anything new on the game system. As much as I like the skyrail, when riding it, it is way too hard to aim on anything for an average player. Besides that, all that is left is a common FPS that we are all too familiar with. The story is still very, very fascinating.  [spoiler] However, I am not a big fan for the BaS ending. It kinda feels that the devs just have to find a way to kill Elizabeth... [/spoiler]  As of the start of 2018, the Elizabeth AI is still one of the bests. I also love the game's visual design. The introduction of Columbia is simply splendid, but it's a shame that no scene later in the game even nearly compares to it. But anyway, we got Elizabeth, what's more to ask?

Este juego tengo que decir que ME EN-CAN-TO y este analisis lo tengo que dividir en cuatro puntos

Primero: La historia que tiene este juego la verdad que al principio te puede llegar a parecer un poco aburrida pero a medida que vas avanzando se vuelve cada vez mas divertida e intersante. No solo lo digo por la historia principal sino tambien por la historia que tienen los personajes que a medida que vas avanzando se vuelven MUY pero MUY intersantes porque estan conectadas con la historia principal y eso hace que no sea tan lineal la historia principal.

Segundo: El mapa que tiene este juego la verdad que se merece un reberendo 10 debido a que no solo el motor grafico lo hace hermososo sino que tambien esa ambientacion de a principios del siglo XX (mas especificamente entre 1910-1920) y ademas que a medida que vas avanzando en el juego el mapa va tomando una consistencia diferente.

Tercero: Los personajes que tiene este juego la verdad que esteticamente son EXCELENTES pero no solo eso sino que tambien como dije antes sus historias estan conectadas con la principal ademas de ser muy interesantes de conocer porque tambien te van resolviendo distintas incognitas que te van surgiendo

Cuarto: Lo que me gusta tambien de este juego es que tira algunos giños de anteriores entregas pero no spoilean nada en si aunque para entender esos guiños es bueno jugar los anteriore Bioshock.

En conlusion, si bien la historia de Bioshock Infinite está escrita por Levine (Quien creo la historia de Bioshock 1) aunque aparezcan algunos guiños a la primera entrega no hay spoilers o una conectividad muy fuerte con el juego

When some of the most exciting and dynamic first-person gameplay in the industry is overshadowed by how amazing the plot and characters are, you know you are dealing with something singular and special.
very nice

Words cannot describe how much i adore this game.
Whilst it lacks the atmosphere of the first two, ditching the dark corridors and halls of Rapture for the vast city of columbia, this game holds something intangibly brilliant in it.
Examining every scene in this game is incredible, and you can detect the unfathomable love and attention the team at irrational games put into this masterpiece. from the anachronistic use of music, to the impressive grasp of quantum mechanics, and the ending which was mindblowing enough to fit in with the giants shoulders on which this game was built, every facet comes together to an interactive piece of art.
And yet, unlike some of the other games referred to as "art", this game retains all the genuine fun a game should. Solid gunplay, brilliantly satisfying "vigours" to replace the plasmids, and characters that you really do feel for make this a game (and very much so a series) I consider to be perfect.

Bioshock Infinite is without doubts one of the best games I've ever played.

You play as Booker DeWitt, a man who has a debt to pay. To do that, he has to enter Columbia and rescue Elizabeth, or at least that's the premise of the game.

I think one of the greatest traits of the game is Columbia, the city they present us, a city that can maintain itself in the air with the help of the advance tecnology the Lutece twins were able to create. At the start presented as an utopia, we can find out quickly that the city is struck with the social problems that were common in the 1900s: religion, racism, differences between classes and various ideologies.

Like in the previous Bioshock games, the story is expanded through visual narrative that you have to put together and several "voxophones" (voice records) that the player can collect and hear to achieve a better understanding of the plot, and although the game's pretty lineal you will have to be very sharp to collect them all.

The gameplay is amazing, very smooth and well done. The combat -a mix of guns and powers- is amazing and very entertaining. They managed to improve in an amazing way the mechanics of the previous games.
The most amazing thing I've seen though, is Elizabeth. Her IA is great, while you're wandering about, scavenging for ammo or salts, she'll sit or interact with the objects in the map. If you happen to stumble across a closed door, she can open it for you and while in combat, she will provide you ammo of your current weapon, salts, health packs and can bring very useful stuff from tears, not to mention that you don't have to protect her as she's able to avoid enemies.

The overall performance was flawless, I didn't have any frame drop or anything like it, so if you have a decent PC you won't have a problem.

Well, to be honest I don't have anything else to say, you won't be disappointed if you buy this game at any price, the ending will be both heartwarming and breaking, you will want to replay it to put everything together for sure!

我除了需要缓缓我被闪瞎的眼睛以外还需要好好看看剧情解析。。。顺便开下海葬

This game is a MASTERPIECE. Starting off with the story: The story was a fantastic mind blowing experience with an amazing atmosphere, great colours, awesome areas and just a great story in general with so much to think of and as you keep playing it just gets so much better and makes you wanna play even more. The weapons are pretty straight forward but were still very nice weapons. The powers in the game were very nice looking and fun to use and you have so many choices on which ones to use. The graphics are magnificent and just makes the game feel so great to play. The Protagonist Booker DeWitt is a good character and a pretty cool bad ass. Elizibeth is a secondary protagonist and provides a lot for you, for example if you need ammo she'll throw you the ammo you need or health kits or salt for your powers and the bond between Booker and Elizibeth so nice and makes you feel connected to her very well. I'll be honest I prefer Rapture City much more over Colombia but Colombia gives a more friendly and more colourful look to it than Rapture City (that is why I liked Rapture City more.) The ending to this game will leave you with some knowledge of what happened but still leaves you hanging, that's where Burial at Sea comes in. With these two Story DLCS comes with a whole new story in Rapture City and each detail you encounter just further more explains the whole story of Bioshock. Episode 1 doesn't give you a whole lot of answers but Episode 2 everything is revealed and after finishing Episode 2 it just makes you look at the story in a completely different way. With all your questions answered it just makes the story so much more better and very interesting. Couple negatives I give this game is that I think the AI is pretty dumb sometimes and the stealth mechanic in the DLC story is poorly done, only because the engine of this game does not go well with stealth mechanics. Over all this game is without a doubt a HUGE would recommend.
Much fun Amazing story you should get it with Bioshock pack so you get all DLC and all games!

I played this game on Xbox when it first came out; I just finished my second playthrough.

Story-wise: a fantastic and mind-bending experience your first playthrough. Extremely underhwelming your second playthrough. Which speaks to the quality of the plot - it was written to shock you and to inspire you to play it again to figure out what the hell it all meant. But once you actually pick it up a second time to have those questions answered, you realize that the story was written around the twists, when it should always be the other way around. Then while you're playing, the technical flaws poke through - flat characters, poor sound design, a hamfisted twist ending - and you're kind of left wishing it was your first-playthrough again, that all this was happening for the first time, not the second.

But that only speaks to the story. As a video game, it's great. Beautiful art direction, music that will give you goose bumps, well-designed vigors, mostly engaging combat (despite very basic and often dumb AI), and an overall enthralling experience.

My personal takeaway: I'm glad I got to experience this game. I wish I only did it once.

剧情逻辑奇怪，把抢这个孩子的康师傅杀了不就行了，自己已经有救回来那个的伊丽莎白了，布克自己就不用回去抢孩子了，就不会变成康师傅了，出了问题不是想解决问题，而是让这个问题消失，这样的逻辑让人很气愤，自己就一定会变成康师傅？多个平行世界的自己都会不一样，杀了会变成康师傅的自己，还会有变成李师傅，王师傅的自己，康师傅抢自己孩子，就把抢自己孩子的那个杀了就行了，为啥自杀，这个游戏的解读让我无法接受，好评如潮的理由多是因为剧情，在游戏性方面枯燥重复，剧情属实恶心人
[spoiler] 伊丽莎白，我喜欢你啊	[/spoiler]

Ну, не знаю чем эта игра так всем понравилась, но я вижу в ней мало хорошего. Главным минусом Bioshock Infinite является то, что это топорный тир с убогим оружием, которое ну совсем не чувствуется. Всю игру, почти безостановочно, нужно просто стрелять в приближающихся врагов, которые постепенно становятся сильнее и растут в своем количестве. Далее, сюжет развивается слишком быстро. Вот мы только на лодке подплываем к маяку, а вот мы уже сражаемся с механическими вундервафлями на каких-то аэродромах и все это за 5 минут прогулок. Ну и финальный, завершающий минус- она абсолютно линейная. Ходишь по пустым коридорам, убиваешь полицаев, идешь дальше. И так было все время, что я в ней провел.

Однако у игры есть как минусы, так и плюсы. Начнем с того, что у infinite отличный сеттинг, летающий город, приятная джазз-блюз музыка на фоне, присутсвует некая сказочная ламповость(до первых выстрелов). Хочется сказать про населенность города, однако тут вылазит еще один "скрытый" минус: ее можно будет увидеть ровно до той самой первой перестрелки. Дальше встретить мирного npc будет редкостью. 

Так как это шутер, а в шутерах главное- геймплей, Bioshock infinite получает от меня 4/10, теряя поинты Имхометра из-за топорности и линейности, но получая их за приятную картинку и сеттинг.
